column2: Perhaps it is due to my natural skills, or because of my devotion to the glorious and mighty Dovah,but I have gained a greater understanding of the Thu'um!
You hold a great sacrifice to gain the patronage of a Dovah. The Dovah are masters of the voice, prehaps they may bestow the gift of conversation onto you.
Your personal shrine to the All mighty Dragons.
Begin work on making a Personal shrine for your very own use to your personal (public) god!
You dedicate your shrine to Alduin, overlord of overlords!
You dedicate your shrine to Kahvozein.
your necromatic activity and research has brought lead to your awareness of an Ancient power in the Soul Carin, which you have begun to worship and commune with.
You dedicate your shrine to Paarthurnax, the Old One, second in commmand of Alduin himself, betrayer of Dovah, Patron of Man
You commune with the dragons to select a personal patron
You have declared Alduin as your patron Dovah
You have declared Kahvozein as your Patron Dovah
Through your necromatic learnings, you have come to worship Durnehviir as your patron Dovah
You have declared the Old One as your Patron Dovah
You select a Dovah for you to personally worship and study.
You honor Alduin, First Born of Akatosh
You Honor Durnehviir, the Cursed One
You Honor Paarthurnax, the Old One
The True will of the Dovah
You embrace the toolage of Alduin and his supreme will
You dedicate yourself to the works and vigor of Kahvozein
You deleve into the mystery surronding the lost one, Durnehviir.
You dedicate yourself to the teachings and legacy of the Old One
Pick a draong as a parton god
The dragoncult is the burgeoning aspect of the Atmoran animalist religion centered around the totem of the dragon that has outgrown it's parent religion.
